text: sadaqe to bas gareebon, muhataajon aur un logon ke lie hai, jo kaam par niyukt hon aur unake lie jinake dilon ko aakrsht karana aur parachaana abheesht ho aur gardanon ko chhudaane aur qarzadaaron aur taavaan bharanevaalon kee sahaayata karane mein, allaah ke maarg mein, musaafiron kee sahaayata karane mein lagaane ke lie hai. yah allaah kee or se thaharaaya hua hukm hai. allaah sab kuchh jaananevaala, atyant tatvadarshee hai
